title: Hammer Bro

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Hammer Throw**: Choose 3 targets, You will Attack 1, Roleblock 1 and Blackmail 1 at random.
- **Lash out** (1x, Day): Instantly attack a target, if they die, your role is revealed publically.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Main ability only debuffs if chosen as the factional attacker.
- **Lash Out** ignores the factional attacker mechanic.
- If executed on the day **Lash Out** is used, a random good player privately plays Rock, Paper, Scissors with you, if you win or tie, or they take too long, you survive the execution.
